column1: '''The Greatest Adventure'''
column2: also known as '''The Ballad of The Hobbit'''
column3: is a song written by [[Maury Laws]] (music) and [[Jules Bass]] (lyric) and performed by [[Glenn Yarbrough]]. It was the theme song for the [[1977]] [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|film adaptation]] of ''[[The Hobbit]]''.
